knowledgeBase.text: Hey! I'm Finn, your fact guy. Want to hear something cool?
Hello! Ready for a fun fact?
Did you know honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found edible honey in ancient tombs!
Octopuses have three hearts. That's a lot of love!
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes. Ask me for more trivia!
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't. Wild, right?
Water can boil and freeze at the same time, thanks to a process called triple point.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
That's all for now! Come back for more facts anytime.
Stay curious! See you next time.

fallback: There's always another fact to discover! What else are you curious about?
